/usr/bin/c++ -g -Wall -rdynamic CMakeFiles/1.getting_started__3.2.shaders_interpolation.dir/src/1.getting_started/3.2.shaders_interpolation/shaders_interpolation.cpp.o -o /repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/bin/1.getting_started/1.getting_started__3.2.shaders_interpolation   -L/repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/repos/tutorials/learn-opengl/lib -lglfw -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lfreetype -lassimp libSTB_IMAGE.a libGLAD.a  -ldl
